function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Excessive exposure to solid fuel increasing the number of deaths among children in the age group of 1 to 4","Impact":"Higher mortality rate among young children","Mitigation":"Use of cleaner and safer cooking fuels and improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"Cleaner fuel technologies, improved ventilation systems","People":"Children in the age group of 1 to 4","Owner":"Policy makers, government, and organizations advocating for public health"},{"Description":"Solid fuel reported as the most significant reason behind many cases of non-fatal pneumonia","Impact":"Increased incidence of non-fatal pneumonia among children","Mitigation":"Promotion of cleaner fuel usage and improved ventilation in households","Technologies":"Cleaner fuel technologies, improved ventilation systems","People":"Children","Owner":"Health organizations, local community leaders, and government"}]}
